newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: Two murdered S.African toddlers found in old fridge.
newsitem.headline: Two murdered S.African toddlers found in old fridge.

text.p: South African squatters discovered two murdered toddlers in an abandoned fridge in Soweto township outside Johannesburg, police said on Wednesday.
They found a three-year-old girl, Mpho Johannes, and a four-year-old boy, Pohane Rathepe, on Tuesday night.
"The girl was strangled and the boy stabbed to death," a police statement said. The motive was not known.
Police said they had detained a man for questioning.
"His wife was severely beaten at the scene by an angry mob and was taken to hospital," they said.
